explanation: Update and return student specific information

parameters.name: social_networks
parameters.description: List of the social networks(twitter, facebook, e.t.c.

requests.curl:
curl "http://localhost:3000/api/v1/me/student" -d '{"data":{"type":"student","attributes":{"email":"wat@wat.wat","phone":"+8 983 47 89 312","full_name":"Sir Wat Name Yeah","social_networks":{"twitter":"https://twitter.com/watever","facebook":"https://facebook.com/watever"}}}}' -X PUT \
	-H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Authorization: Bearer 525bbf7118596df4c6a3468fe0eab7cc5cfedf14b4e32ab05a62b56e3148c18c" \
	-H "Host: example.org" \
	-H "Cookie: "
